meanings.definition: Make (something, especially a person's hair) untidy.
meanings.sent1: She tousled her brother's hair playfully.
meanings.sent2: After playing outside, her hair was tousled by the wind.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tousled the boy's hair, making him laugh.
meanings.sent4: The storm tousled the trees, leaving them looking wild and unkempt.
meanings.sent5: The children tousled each other's hair during the pillow fight.

meanings.definition: (Of a person's hair) untidy or disheveled.
meanings.sent1: His tousled hair gave him a carefree look.
meanings.sent2: The tousled hair of the little girl showed she had been playing outside.
meanings.sent3: Despite his tousled appearance, he still looked charming.
meanings.sent4: The tousled hair of the model added a touch of casual elegance to the photo shoot.
meanings.sent5: The tousled hair of the surfer gave him a laid-back vibe.
